Sonya.name: Ancient Spear
Sonya.description: Throw out a spear that pulls you to the first enemy hit, dealing 173 (+4% per level) damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate 40 Fury.

Sonya.name: Seismic Slam
Sonya.description: Deals 176 (+4% per level) damage to the target enemy, and 44 (+4% per level) to enemies behind the target.

Sonya.name: Whirlwind
Sonya.description: Deals 441 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies over 3 seconds, and heals for 25% of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.

Sonya.name: Leap
Sonya.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

Sonya.name: Wrath of the Berserker
Sonya.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against you by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

Sonya.name: Fury
Sonya.description: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking or dealing damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

1.name: Block
1.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Shot of Fury
1.description: Increases your maximum Fury by 50. You can also activate your Trait to gain 50 Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding.

1.name: War Paint
1.description: Basic Attacks heal you for 30% of the damage dealt.

4.name: Focused Attack
4.description: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Hurricane
4.description: Reduces the cooldown of Whirlwind by 1 second and Whirlwind removes all slows and roots on Sonya.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

4.name: Shattered Ground
4.description: Increases Seismic Slam splash damage to 75% of primary target damage.

7.name: Composite Spear
7.description: Increases the range of Ancient Spear by 30% and increases Fury generated by 20.

7.name: Ferocious Healing
7.description: Consume 20 Fury to heal 10% of your maximum Health.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

7.name: Poisoned Spear
7.description: Ancient Spear deals an additional 150% damage over 6 seconds.

10.name: Leap
10.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

10.name: Wrath of the Berserker
10.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against you by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

13.name: Aftershock
13.description: Using Seismic Slam reduces its Fury cost by 50% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Life Funnel
13.description: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35%, tripled versus Heroes.

13.name: Mystical Spear
13.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 3 seconds. You are pulled to the target location even if you don't hit an enemy.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Furious Blow
16.description: Increases Seismic Slam damage by 50%, but costs 40 Fury.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds. Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Nerves of Steel
16.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

16.name: No Escape
16.description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 25%.

20.name: Anger Management
20.description: Increases all Fury generated during Wrath of the Berserker by 100%.

20.name: Arreat Crater
20.description: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.

20.name: Ignore Pain
20.description: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage. Usable while Whirlwinding.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.
